## Observation notes  
Historical records documented in Buckell, 1950, with numerous sightings in the Pacific Maritime (see Best list for historical record to 2000). M. Clausen, Masters thesis: 2017, <span class="hl-place-name">Delta</span>. Guzman et al., 2023: (Elle), 2005; (Neame), 2007; (Wray), 2012; (Gillespie), 2015, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>. (Gehrels), 2013, <span class="hl-place-name">Lower Mainland</span>. NBSBC Bee Atlas Database: (Zand), 2021, 2022; (Gadzik), 2022, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>. iNaturalist: <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Galiano Island</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Lower Mainland</span>, from 2017.
